Posted By: Jeff Britton
I won the Scrapps Lot ....My intent is to have it graded by SGC and sell it as a full set.

I have a Gleason SGC 30 currently at SGC for reholdering into the form cut holder (Currently in mylar baggie). Should get it back in 3 weeks. 

Richardson is a Detroit player and was not included in this lot. I do have one available graded SGC 40.
